meanings.definition: Resembling or having the color of a lemon or citron.
meanings.sent1: The citreous walls of the kitchen brightened up the room.
meanings.sent2: She picked a citreous dress for the sunny day.
meanings.sent3: The citreous cat costume made everyone smile at the party.
meanings.sent4: His citreous personality always brought a ray of sunshine.
meanings.sent5: The citreous glow of the sunset painted the sky in golden hues.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to citrus fruits.
meanings.sent1: The citreous aroma of the oranges filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent2: Her citreous smoothie was a refreshing treat on a hot day.
meanings.sent3: The citreous juice sprayed all over when he squeezed the lemon.
meanings.sent4: The citreous zest added a burst of flavor to the dish.
meanings.sent5: The citreous trees in the orchard were heavy with ripe fruits.
